name: Topics in Political Theory
description: This seminar explores the ways in which political theory can deepen our understanding of contemporary political issues. Topics may include the following: cities and citizenship; multiculturalism and religious pluralism; the legacies of colonialism; global justice; democratic theory; the nature of power.Area of Focus: Political Theory
prerequisites: [(POLB70H3) or (POLB71H3) or POLB72H3] and [1.5 credits at the C-level in POL courses]
